other_title: Young Kiitarou and His Youkai Picture Diary
奇異太郎少年の妖怪絵日記
ending_theme: #2: "Akane-iro Clochette (茜色クロシェット)" by Akira Ouse (逢瀬アキラ) (ep 2)
